isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: msg.sender is the token contract _operator The address which called `safeTransferFrom` function on the token contract

params._tokenId: The NFT identifier which is being transferred _data Additional data with no specified format
params._user: The address which previously owned the token

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
